title: Google Achieves Quantum Supremacy 2.0 – Solves Problem in Seconds That Would Take Classical Computer 47,000 Years
shortdescription: Sycamore 3 quantum processor breaks all records as Google stock surges 18% on breakthrough announcement.
description: Sycamore 3 completes calculation in 200 seconds that would take world's fastest supercomputer 47,000 years — Google stock jumps 18%.
author: Gwen John

title: Ethereum 2.0 Final Upgrade Complete – Network Processes 100,000 Transactions Per Second
shortdescription: The Merge Part 2 brings instant finality and zero gas fees as ETH price surges 40% overnight.
description: Network now processes 100K TPS with near-zero fees — ETH price jumps 40% as scalability breakthrough completes.
author: Emma Chen

title: Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF Hits $1 Trillion – First Index Fund to Reach Milestone
shortdescription: VTI becomes world's largest fund as passive investing revolution reaches new heights.
description: VTI reaches $1T AUM milestone — first index fund to hit trillion-dollar mark, validating Jack Bogle's vision.
image: /images/Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF Hits $1 Trillion.webp
author: Mark Blaze

title: Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users – Becomes World's Most Used AI Assistant
shortdescription: Alexa's new multimodal AI powers smart homes, cars, and offices as Amazon stock jumps 12%.
description: Alexa reaches 1B monthly active users — surpasses Siri, Google Assistant, and Copilot combined as Amazon stock surges 12%.
image: /images/Amazon Alexa AI Surpasses 1 Billion Active Users.webp
author: Gwen John
